meta.title: AVA Little Tokyo - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: AVA Little Tokyo - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.h2: Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA.
div.span: AVA is the new living space in the heart of Little Tokyo – where wine bars and new clubs converge with galleries and restaurants, where sushi meets tacos, and music collides with performing arts. Oh yeah, and we're just blocks from the Gold and Red Metro lines giving you easy access to Downtown LA. From the Staples Center and Disney Concert Hall to the Dorothy Chandler Pavilion and LA Live, the best of downtown LA is at your fingertips.AVA's studio, 1-, 2- and 3- bedroom Los Angeles apartments feature urban-inspired designs that extends beyond your walls to social spaces throughout the community. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Experience the 6th floor deck with dramatic city skyline views, a social bar and movie wall. The indoor chill lounge is an edgy and magnetic space that features game tables and plush community style seating. It's perfect for a group of people to mingle or for you to hang solo. There is an awesome two-level fitness center and DIY spaces where you can roll up your sleeves and get creative.Oh, and don't forget about the controlled access underground parking and bike storage. So, what are you waiting for? Dive in and make it yours by clicking the Contact Us button above, today.Los Angeles Apartments by Avalon Ideally located in Southern California, our Los Angeles apartments offer you the latest features and amenities. California is bursting with entertainment options including major attractions such as Universal Studios, Getty Center, Walt Disney Concert Hall, and the Hollywood Walk of Fame. Take a stroll around Los Angeles and discover a wide range of shopping and dining venues, just waiting to be explored!Los Angeles Apartment Community Being part of AVA Little Tokyo ensures that you get more time for yourself and less time dealing with problems like apartment maintenance and upkeep. So what are you waiting for? Dive in and make our Los Angeles apartments your new home today. Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Find your fit at AVA. Whether you’re hitting the weights, the trails, or the yoga mat, we’ve got your back.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes are designed with sustainability in mind, so you can live in an environment that’s lighter on the planet and its resources.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Pet-friendly community with WAG Pet Spa

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Give us a shout to learn more about AVA. We know you’ll like what we have to say.

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information

From the Staples Center and Disney Concert Hall to the Dorothy Chandler Pavilion and LA Live, the best of downtown LA is at your fingertips.AVA's studio, 1-, 2- and 3- bedroom Los Angeles apartments feature urban-inspired designs that extends beyond your walls to social spaces throughout the community. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Experience the 6th floor deck with dramatic city skyline views, a social bar and movie wall. The indoor chill lounge is an edgy and magnetic space that features game tables and plush community style seating. It's perfect for a group of people to mingle or for you to hang solo. There is an awesome two-level fitness center and DIY spaces where you can roll up your sleeves and get creative.Oh, and don't forget about the controlled access underground parking and bike storage.
